desc: *** PLZ BID ONLY IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN FULL TIME JOB ****** PLZ BID ONLY AFTER READING THE DESCRIPTION CAREFULLY ********* ELSE YOUR BID WILL BE REPORTED AS SPAM TO FREELANCER ******Hi everyone,We are currently setting up a new Shopify store with high quality fashion jewelry and other accessories targeted only for cat lovers. At the moment we are adding 25 new products on average per day in our product portfolio and the goal is to have at least 10,000 products.I need you to write the SEO optimized, detailed and creative “Title & Product Description” of the products on our Shopify store at first;1)	by looking at product pictures and specifications2)	to convince the reader to buy/try the productI will provide the product links with product specifications and you will have to write the product description in a way that's precise, inviting and educational (from the fashion/style standpoint). The goal is to sell the product to the audience based on this product description. Feel free to add your touch of creativity and sense of humor.Before bidding on this project, I strongly encourage you to go through the products on the website ([url removed, login to view] or [url removed, login to view]) and check if you can write the description of similar products or not. Please bid only if you think you can.This is a long term project I would require later your help with in next phases too. Once this phase is completed, I will need help with blog posts, email marketing, social content, etc.REQUIREMENTS:1. Free of spelling errors2. Free of grammatical errors3. Original (Plagiarism free ... need to pass 2 tools including premium copyscape)4. Articles/Descriptions should be of at least 300 words.5. Both the title and description must be SEO optimized.6. The focus/goal of product description must be to convince the reader to buy/try the product.7. The product description should consist of sections, small paragraphs, some bullet points.SAMPLE DESCRIPTIONS:1. URL: ([url removed, login to view])2. URL: ([url removed, login to view])If you think your writing style can match the requirement then let me hear from you.HOW TO BID:1)	Please bid for your monthly salary. (approx. 200 hours of workload per month).2)	Provide your sample work. (Use any product from the stores “[url removed, login to view]” or [url removed, login to view]” and provide me the URL of the product and your title & description.)3)	How many product descriptions can you provide per day?4)    *Newcomers but trustworthy and hardworking freelancers are most welcome too.QUESTIONS FOR PROPOSAL:Please answer the following questions when submitting a proposal:1. How many product descriptions can you provide per day?2. What challenging part of this job are you most experienced in?3. Which of the required job skills do you feel you are strongest at?4. Which part of this project do you think will take the most time?5. Why do you think you are a good fit for this particular job?
title: FULLTIME EMPLOYEE [Copywriter, Copywriting, Product Description, SEO Writing]
